agreePage.title: Agreement to the terms of use
agreePage.description1: Hi {{employeeName}}, letâ€™s start to conclude contract with {{companyName}} by creating your own electronic signature.
agreePage.description2: Please agree to the document attached below. Files will be provided PDF copies with electronic signature.

personalAgreement.title: Agreement to privacy policy
personalAgreement.description1: Consent to the collection and use of essential personal information is required for labor contracts and personnel management,
personalAgreement.description2: and the conclusion and maintenance of labor contracts can only be achieved if agreed.

securityAgreement.title: Security Maintenance Pledge
securityAgreement.description: Note that you may not grant the Company to collect and use your non-essential personal information. However, if you do not agree to the disclosure of your non-essential personal information, you may be disadvantaged for welfare benefit.

reviewPage.title: Reviewing document
reviewPage.description1: Please create your electronic signature after reviewing the labor contract.
reviewPage.description2: If you have any questions or inquiries, please contact to
reviewPage.buttonTitle: Go to review the contract document

signPage.title: Creating electronic signature
signPage.description2: Using mobile device makes easy to draw your signature.

confirmPage.title: Completed
confirmPage.description1: Signed document will be saved secured.
confirmPage.descriptionForUnregister: Please create the password and download signed document.
confirmPage.descriptionForRegister: Please click the button and download your signed document.
confirmPage.loadingForDone: Completing creating electronic signature. Please wait for a moment...

basicInfoModal.title: Basic Info
basicInfoModal.description: Please fill out the date of birth field to conclude the contract.

certification.title: Identity verification process
certification.errorMessage: Employee's name is different from verified identity.
